org.apache.ignite.igfs

Interface IgfsReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IgfsInputStream, IgfsRangeInputStream

    public interface IgfsReader
extends Closeable
    The simplest data input interface to read from secondary file system in dual modes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int read(long pos, byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Read up to the specified number of bytes, from a given position within a file, and return the number of bytes read.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • read

        int read(long pos,
       byte[] buf,
       int off,
       int len)
         throws IOException
        Read up to the specified number of bytes, from a given position within a file, and return the number of bytes read.
        Parameters:
        pos - Position in the input stream to seek.
        buf - Buffer into which data is read.
        off - Offset in the buffer from which stream data should be written.
        len - The number of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        Total number of bytes read into the buffer, or -1 if there is no more data (EOF).
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of any exception.
